College_Summary: Institute for Technology and Management (ITM) Raipur was established in 2012 in Naya Raipur and one of Chhattisgarh's premier private Universities for higher education. It is a sprawling 25-acre campus that is situated in the upcoming education Hub of Nava Raipur Atal Nagar. The Ministry of Human Resource Development has awarded the University the title of the Cleanest University of India and is also Ranked No. 1 in Chhattisgarh for 2021 by International Education Directory "uniRank".

HNLU is a law University recognized by UGC and is approved by BCI. The Institute offers UG and PG programme along with PhD programmes. Under UG domain, it offers BA LLB (Hons.) and under PG domain it offers LLM. The admission in UG programmes is on the basis of CLAT and for PhD the university conducts its own Entrance Exam.

College_Summary: NIT Raipur is a public technical and research university in Raipur, India. It was founded in 1956. Engineering, technology, basic sciences, humanities, and social sciences are all available at the undergraduate, graduate, and doctoral levels at NIT Raipur. The National Institutes of Technology Act of 2007 grants funding to it and designates it as an Institute of National Importance. Also, check NIT Raipur Courses.

College_Summary: Dr. C.V. Raman University (CVRU) is a premier world-class University in Chhattisgarh located in the serenity area of Bilaspur city, and most importantly, in Central India as the Research and Education hub of Professional Courses. The university functions under the AISECT Group of Universities (AGU). CVRU Bilaspur offers undergraduate, postgraduate and doctoral courses in diverse fields like Management, Arts, Science, Law, Naturopathy and many more. Admission to CVRU Bilaspur is done on the basis of merit and CAT/ XAT/ MAT/ GATE/ CVRU CET scores. Apart from regular programs, the university also offers distance education in the discipline of Management, Social Work, Information Technology, Commerce, etc. Admission to CVRU IODE Bilaspur is done on the basis of merit.

College_Summary: Indira Gandhi Krishi Vishwavidyalaya, located in the rice bowl of India is an educational institution serving for the acceleration of growth in agriculture of Chhattisgarh since its inception in 1987. The journey which started as ‘Labhandi Farm’ is evolved into a huge campus of Indira Gandhi Krishi Vishwavidyalaya. The University offers a plethora of courses in Agriculture Discipline through Undergraduate, Postgraduate and Ph.D.  programs. The University has 23 constituent government colleges and 15 affiliated private colleges.

Guru Ghasidas Vishwavidyalaya, formerly known as Guru Ghasidas University (GGU) is a central university located in the Bilaspur district, Chhattisgarh. Established in 1983, GGU is one of the Chhattisgarh's largest and oldest institutions of higher education. GGU offers UG, PG, PhD, Diploma, and Certificate programs in the fields of Arts, Science, Commerce, Engineering, Management, and many more.

College_Summary: Established in 1964, Pt. Ravishankar Shukla University (PRSU) is Chhattisgarh's largest and oldest institution of higher education. PRSU is accredited by the NAAC with a ‘B++’ grade and ranked 151-200 by NIRF 2023 among the top universities in India. The university has a huge campus of 300.16 acres in the western part of the capital of Chhattisgarh, Raipur. PRSU has a total enrollment of over 5000 students and 100 faculty members. With 29 departments and 156 affiliated colleges, PRSU offers UG, PG, PG Diploma, Diploma, Doctoral, and Post Doctoral programs. Admissions at PRSU are done based on scores obtained in the entrance examination.

It is the first ‘Media Gurukul’ of India. It provides excellent education and research facility in the field of journalism. The university is named after Late Sri Kushabhau Thakre who was one of the great political leaders of the country.

College_Summary: Chhattisgarh Kamdhenu Vishwavidyalaya is a public university established in the year 2012. It was established by the Governor of Chhattisgarh under State of the Chhattisgarh Kamdhenu Vishwavidyalaya Act, 2011. The university is affiliated with UGC. Chattisgarh Kamdhenu University has several constituent colleges. Chattisgarh Kamdhenu University is aimed to provide higher education in veterinary and animal science. The University offers a number of UG, PG and Ph.D.courses in the field of Veterinary and Animal Sciences to facilitate an integrated approach for the all-round development of livestock, poultry and fisheries through imparting quality education, intense research and development for sustainable productivity to augment and garner a dynamic livestock economy for the state.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Technology [B.Tech] (Dairy Science and Food Technology)

College_Summary: IIT Bhilai is an autonomous university, established in 2016. IIT Bhilai offers BTech, MTech, MSc, and PhD degrees. IIT Bhilai operates from its transit campus in Government Engineering College (GEC) Raipur, Chhattisgarh. IIT Bhilai has its own hostels for males and females on campus, which are provided by GEC Raipur. IIT Bhilai will be located on roughly 447 acres of land near the Bhilai villages of Kutelabatta and Sirsa Khurd. IIT Bhilai's permanent campus is currently being built.

College_Summary: MATS University, Raipur run by Shri Bhagwan Mahavir Jain Education and Cultural Society, is a private university of Chhattisgarh state, established by the Government of Chhattisgarh in 2006. The university has two campuses – one is at the heart of the city, next to Pandri Bus Stand, Raipur while the main campus is spread across 100 acres of green lush land in Aarang in the outskirts of Raipur with a well-connected network of public transport. The university is recognized by UGC and approved by the Chhattisgarh Private Universities Regulatory Commission, AICTE, NCTE, BCI, and PCI. It is a member of AIU. The university is accredited by NAAC with a B++ Grade. MATS University offers several Diploma, Undergraduate, Postgraduate and Doctoral Programs through 14 schools or academic departments. Currently, it boasts 17,000+ strength of students pursuing UG and PG degrees under Regular and Distance Learning Programs.

Amity University, Raipur, Chhattisgarh recognized by UGC has been established in 2014. It is considered a private university in Chhattisgarh. It has an expert faculty of over 150 members.The varsity is currently offering 40+ UG, PG, and Ph.D. level programs. The most popular programs offered are in the Engineering field followed by the Management courses. Admission to the B.Tech program is done on the basis of JEE Mains/ Amity JEE or any other state-level examination. While for the Management program, scores obtained in CAT/ MAT/ GMAT or GRE are considered.

International Institute of Information Technology, Naya Raipur has been established in the year 2013 by Chhattisgarh Government and NTPC. The institute is also affiliated by UGC, New Delhi. IIIT promises to present entrepreneurial skills to the aspirants to make them able to deal with real problems. The institute’s premier objective is also to constantly focus on teaching, research, and consultancy.

College_Summary: The first kind of Bhilai Institute of Technology came into presence on the July month of 1986. Bhilai Institute of Technology, Raipur (BITR) was founded in the year 2009 as the successor institution by the BIT Trust (Seth BalKrishan Memorial), which already regulates the institution at Durg. It offers Diploma, UG and PG level courses in the Engineering discipline. It is one of the great sorts after engineering college organized in Kendri on the rapidly expanding heart of the Raipur city. It has bagged few rankings.

Government Engineering College (GEC) Bilaspur popularly known as GECB was established in 1964. It is a government-oriented college located in Bilaspur, Chhattisgarh, India. Institute is affiliated to Chhattisgarh Swami Vivekanand Technical University. It is offering 7 UG courses under B.E. and B.Tech. degrees. The institute is located near Korba road amidst the peaceful, lush green and natural region of Koni village. This Institute is approved by AICTE and accredited by NBA.

OP Jindal University (OPJU), established by Jindal Group, is at a fast pace striving to make a mark in the delivery of outstanding education and research. Established in 2014, OP Jindal University is a private institution that provides courses such as Diploma, B.Tech., BBA, and B.Sc. courses at the undergraduate level and M.Tech. MBA and MSc. at the postgraduate level. OP Jindal University Common Entrance Exam (OPJU CEE) is an important exam the student must qualify to get admission into OP Jindal University.

College_Summary: Lakhmi Chand Institute of Technology (LCIT), Bilaspur established in 2008, under the aegis of Shree ShreeVidyaSagarjiMaharaj, is a name synonymous with holistic education; the institute has single mindedly pursued commitment to provide the youth the opportunity to receive high quality education of global standards. The College is affiliated to Chhatisgarh Swami Vivekananda Technical university and approved by AICTE

The Institute of Chartered Financial Analysts of India (ICFAI) University, Raipur imparts career-oriented educational programs at UG, PG, Diploma & PG Diploma levels. There are 15 programs offered in multiple disciplines in management, information technology, and science & technology. Check ICFAI University Raipur Courses & Fees

RITEE Group of Institutions, established in 1995 by the Mahanadi Education Society, RITEE Group of Institutions, Raipur, offers technical and professional education. RITEE is a private college affiliated to Chhattisgarh Swami Vivekanand Technical University is operated under the guidance of Mr. Swaroopchand Jain, the first Mayor of Raipur, and Mr. Shailendra Jain, an engineer and the Society’s Secretary, RITEE. It is approved by AICTE and is one of the oldest private management and technical institutions offering undergraduate and postgraduate courses in the discipline of Engineering & Technology and Management.

College_Name: Shri Shankaracharya Institute of Technology & Management, Raipur
College_Summary: Shri Shankaracharya Institute of Professional Management and Technology (SSIPMT), Raipur is ranked in B-Band (26th - 50th) among Private Engineering Colleges All Over India and ranked 1 among Private Engineering Colleges in Chattisgarh by ARIIA. The institute comes under the aegis of the Shri Gangajali Education Society (SGES), Bhilai. SSIPMT is affiliated to Chhattisgarh Swami Vivekanand Technical University (CSVTU), Bhilai. The Management and Technology Institute is approved by the All-India Council for Technical Education (AICTE), New Delhi. SSIPMT Raipur offers degree programs in the discipline of Engineering and Management.

College_Name: Chhatrapati Shivaji Institute of Technology - [CSIT], Durg
College_Summary: Chhatrapati Shivaji Institute of Technology (CSIT), Durg is ranked 19th among Top 100 T-Schools (Overall) - Government and Private and ranked 4th among Zone Wise Top 10 T-Schools by Data Quest 2020 Rankings. The institute offers degree and doctoral courses in the discipline of Computer Science Engineering, Civil Engineering, Mechanical Engineering and many more. Admission is done on the basis of merit and cutoff criteria of the institute. The institute has two sister institutes which are as follows:

Upper_Section_Details.Approval: NCTE, AICTE, PCI, BCI, UGC, AIU

College_Summary: Shri Rawatpura Sarkar University is a premier non-profit and welfare organization of teaching and research in the country, run by Shri Rawatpura Sarkar Lok Kalyan Trust. It was established in 2018 under the Chhattisgarh Private Universities Act, 2005, affiliated by UGC (University Grant Commission) under section 2(f) of UGC Act 1956. Shri Rawatpura Sarkar University offers courses in Engineering, Arts, Science, Commerce, Pharmacy, Yoga, Education, Paramedical, Law, Management, Social work, Journalism, Library and Information Science, Fashion and Interior Designing, Banking and various Government sectors.

College_Name: Columbia Institute of Engineering and Technology
Maharishi University of Management and Technology Bilaspur Campus - [MUMT], Bilaspur
College_Summary: Maharishi University of Management and Technology (MUMT), Bilaspur has been established in the year 2002 by the Legislature of Chhattisgarh State. MUMT is a part of Maharishi Ji's worldwide global education movement. Maharishi Ji has introduced Consciousness based, scientifically validated ideal system of education in the main stream of present education, worldwide. It is a private type university. All Degree/Diploma/Certificate awarded by this university are at par with Degrees/Diplomas and Certificate of other Universities in India, established under statutory provisions of central of state government. MUMT courses are not only "job oriented' but also are "life oriented-life supporting".

College_Name: AAFT University of Media and Arts - [AAFT], Raipur
College_Summary: AAFT University of Media and Arts (AAFT), Raipur, was established in the recent year 2018 and recognized with the status of Private University under the aegis of Marwah Studios and managed to become media frontier. The institute is a prime member of AAFT Group of Institutions which was instituted in 1993 at the prominent location of Film City, Noida. The university is fully recognized by UGC, MHRD, Govt. of India, ICMEI (International Chamber of Media & Entertainment Industry), and Govt. of Chhatisgarh. Home to over 20,000 students from 180+ countries, AAFT offers courses in many genres at the Diploma, UG, PG, and PG Diploma levels.

Chouksey Engineering College (CEC), Bilaspur was established in 2001. CEC comes under the aegis of Chouksey Group of Colleges. The institute offers various courses at undergraduate and postgraduate level in the disciplines of Engineering, Management and Pharmacy. Admission to the CEC Bilaspur is done on the basis of JEE Main, CGPPHT, CAT, MAT, AMAT, CMAT, GPAT scores. Additionally, the institute has a training and placement cell that provides 100% placement assistance to its students. The highest package offered is INR 12 LPA and the average package offered is INR 3.5 LPA. Some of the top recruiters of CEC are Amazon, Infosys, Wipro, Samsung, Airtel, Axis Bank, Cognizant, etc.

College_Name: Christian College of Engineering and Technology - [CCET], Bhilai
RCET, Bhilai- Rungta College Of Engineering And Technology
College_Summary: Rungta College of Engineering & Technology (RCET), Bhilai is ranked 3rd in East Zone for Engineering Program by India Today and ranked 53rd in India for Engineering Program by The Week. RCET offers UG, PG, Doctoral and Diploma programs in the discipline of Engineering and Management. The most popular courses of the institution are B.Tech across 13 specializations, M.Tech in 3 specializations and MBA. Apart from that, RCET also offers MCA, Diploma, and Ph.D programs. Admission to RCET Bhilai on the basis of various national or state entrance test scores. For B.Tech admission, candidates are required to obtain a valid score in JEE/ CGPET. MBA admission depends on CMAT/MAT/CAT/XAT/ATMA scores, whereas for the M.Tech course, candidates are shortlisted on the basis of their performance in GATE. The candidates can apply for the same through the official website of the institute.

College_Summary: Krishna Engineering College, Bhilai, Chhattisgarh has been emerging as an Institute of excellence in science and technology education and research. It is affiliated to Chhattisgarh Swami Vivekanand Technical University (CSVTU), which bestows the degrees of Bachelor of Engineering (B.Tech) in 4 branches – Civil Engineering, Computer Science and Engineering, Electrical Engineering and Mechanical Engineering. Mainly, the admissions to all the courses are conducted through Central Online Counseling administered by Directorate of technical Education, Government of Chhattisgarh.

College_Name: RSR Rungta College of Engineering and Technology - [RSRRCET], Bhilai
College_Summary: RSR Rungta College of Engineering and Technology (RSRRCET), Bhilai is one of the reputed Engineering Institutions in Chhattisgarh and known for its excellent record in academics and co-curricular activities. RSRRCET Bhilai comes under the aegis of  Sanjay Rungta Group of Institutions Bhilai. The college offers undergraduate, postgraduate and diploma courses in the discipline Civil (Structural Engineering, Mech (Production Engineering), EE (Power System & Control).

College_Summary: Shri Shankaracharya College of Engineering and Technology is the first Engineering College in India to be named after Adi Shri Shankaracharya. The college is situated in Bhilai district of Chhattisgarh.

Shri Shankaracharya Technical Campus, established in 1999, is approved by AICTE and is accredited with grade ‘A’ from NAAC. The institute offers Bachelor and Master courses in engineering, management and pharmaceutical disciplines. Admission to the B.Tech course is based on the score obtained by candidates in the PET or JEE Main whereas admission to M.Tech course is based on the GATE score.

College_Summary: Rungta College of Engineering & Technology (RCET), Raipur is ranked 19th in All India Ranking (Engineering) by India Today and ranked 23rd in Top 30 Private Colleges (Engineering) in India by Outlook. RCET offers undergraduate, postgraduate and diploma programs in the discipline of Engineering. The most popular courses of the institution are B.Tech and M.Tech. Apart from that, RCET also offers Polytechnic Diploma programs. Admission to RCET Raipur on the basis of various national or state entrance test scores. For B.Tech admission, candidates are required to obtain a valid score in JEE/ CGPET, whereas for the M.Tech course, candidates are shortlisted on the basis of their performance in GATE. Candidates need a valid score in CGPPT for admission in the Polytechnic Diploma course. The candidates can apply for the courses through the official website of the institute.

College_Name: Rungta Educational Foundation Bhilai Campus, Bhilai
College_Summary: Rungta Educational Foundation, Bhilai is one of the most well-established education pillars in the society that is offering knowledge in numerous domains. Rungta College was granted approval under Section 2(F) by the University Grants Commission (UGC) for all colleges within the group. Rungta College of Engineering and Technology (RCET), Bhilai was conferred Autonomous state by UGC in 2023. Naac Grade A for RCET. The institution offers various degree, diploma and doctoral courses in the discipline of Engineering, Pharmacy, Management and Science. Admission to the programs is done on the basis of marks secured in entrance tests. Direct Link to Apply for Rungta Admissions

Rungta Engineering College(REC) is a private institution that was established in 2009 in the city of Raipur, Chhattisgarh. The college is approved by the All India Council of Technical Education(AICTE) and Directorate of Technical Education, Government of Chhattisgarh. The college is affiliated with the Chhattisgarh Swami Vivekananda Technical University, Bhilai and has also been accredited by the National Assessment and Accreditation Council(NAAC).

College_Summary: All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS) Raipur is a public university and medical research institute located in Chattisgarh, India. AIIMS Raipur is one of the six AIIMS colleges established in 2012 by the Ministry of Health and Family Welfare, Government of India. The institute is approved by the Medical Council of India (MCI). AIIMS Raipur offers 44 courses in 36 streams such as full-time UG, PG, Super-speciality and Doctoral programmes in Medical, Paramedical and AYUSH. The institute also provides paramedical and certificate programmes like the BSc, Bachelor in Audiology and Speech-Language Pathology (BASLP), Advanced Diploma in Radiotherapy Technology (ADRT), and Pre-Hospital Trauma Technician (PTT) at the undergraduate level and MPH at the graduate level.

College_Summary: Disha College is a co-educational college situated in Raipur, Chhattisgarh. The college was started in 2001 and is managed, governed, and owned autonomously by the Disha Education Society. Disha College is affiliated by Pt. Ravishankar Shukla University, Raipur. The college offers various undergraduate, postgraduate, and diploma courses. The educational institution is duly approved by University Grants Commission (UGC), AICTE. At present, the college is rendering its services to a number of 1480 students. The co-educational Disha College offers science courses, commerce courses, teaching courses, and computer courses.

College_Summary: The Bharti College (BIIT), situated in the Durg district of Chattisgarh was founded in the year 2008. The college is affiliated to Hemchand Yadav Vishwavidyalaya, Durg.

College_Summary: Ayush and Health Science University was established in the year 2009, located in GE Road in Chattisgarh.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Ayurvedic Medicine and Surgery

College_Summary: Bastar University is one of the premier institutions of higher education in the Bastar Region approved by UGC (University Grants Commission) founded in 2008. It has 35 affiliated colleges. Currently, there are 8 postgraduate departments and 1 Graduate program at the University. Admissions to these courses are done purely on the basis of merit scored in the previous qualifying examination.

Chhattisgarh Swami Vivekanand Technical University (CSVTU) is state technical university, located in Chhattisgarh, India. Established in 2005, CSVTU has more than 96 affiliated colleges. The university has a total number of 44 Engineering colleges, 40 Polytechnics, 11 Pharmacy colleges, and 1 Architecture institute under its affiliation. Check CSVTU Affiliated Colleges

Chhattisgarh University, The prime objective of the university is to bring comprehensive changes in the field of education, by making it cost effective and within the reach of all. The vision of the university is to establish centre of excellence for transmitting industry the applicable education to produce professional fully equipped with skills organizational capabilities to accomplish the objective entrusted upon them. The mission of the university is to bestow quality education and creating research facilities under one roof. It was established for a modern academic and technological learning. The programmes are designed to give students a sound grasp of the subject and up to date knowledge of the latest developments in their respective fields.

Indira Kala Sangit Vishwavidyalay (IKSVV) is one of the oldest music university, established in the year 1956. The institution was inaugurated by Late Priya Darshani and Indira Gandhi. Scholars of Music, Musicians, Musicologists and a number of notable personalities mark their presence in the campus, acquitting the latest and the best in Indian Classical Music. The objectives of the University is to provide instructions in all branches of Music and Fine Arts, helping in the dissemination of music throughout the country.

Pandit Sundarlal Sharma Open University, shortly referred to as PSSOU, was established in 2005, by the Chhattisgarh government. It has its regional centers located in Bilaspur, Jagdalpur, Korba. Raipur, Ambikapur, Durg, and Jashpur. The college offers 20 different courses for UG and PG. Admissions are merit-based for most courses, and in certain cases, dependent on scores in the respective entrance examination.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Library and Information Science [B.Lib.I.Sc]

College_Summary: Sarguja University, located in Ambikapur, Chhattisgarh, was established in 2008. It was formerly known as Sarguja Vishvavidyalaya. The institute offers M.A, M.Sc, and LLM courses at the PG level, and a Diploma course. It also offers Ph.D. courses in a multitude of disciplines. Admissions to the PG and Diploma courses are merit-based, while admissions to the Ph.D. courses are on the basis of an entrance exam conducted by the institute itself. Applications are accepted online.

Established in 1974, St Vincent Pallotti College got its name under the renowned St. Vincent Pallotti who was a well known saint.  It is more of a charitable organization that helps students to keep pace with the growing market standards. It helps them to come out of the rudimentary elements and get themselves established in the forefront. Students are entrusted to the level of getting the unbiased culture in terms of studies and assignments to excel in their career path.The courses offered here do vary from bachelor’s degree to Master’s level. The various programmes do include- B.Ed. (Bachelor of Education), Bachelor of Commerce, BCA (Bachelor of Computer Application), BBA (Bachelor in Business Administration), Master of Commerce and PGDCA (PG Diploma in Computer Application). There is abundant amount of scope for students who tend to get a degree from the above.Professional skills and utilities like- Assistant Manager, Company Law Assistant, Junior Accountant, Relationship Manager, Sales Officer (Accounts), Hardware, Software, Networking, Database management, security, work in coaching centers, education departments, home tuitions, educational consultancies, private tuitions, positions in call centers/ BPOs and in Computer sections, HR and also Finance, CA, CWA,ACA and ACS can be opted by the qualified students.

College_Name: Dr. CV Raman University, Institute of Open and Distance Education, Bilaspur
College_Summary: Dr. CV Raman University, Institute of Open and Distance Education (IODE), Bilaspur is awarded ‘Best University in Distance Online Learning’ by ASSOCHAM and awarded with the ‘World Education Award’ for best and next practices in Open and Distance Learning at World Education Summit. With 87 proposed study centers across Chhattisgarh, this institute offers students 41 different courses in 5 different departments. IODE Bilaspur offers degree and diploma in the discipline of Management, Information Technology, Commerce, Science, Biology, Economics, etc.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Post Graduate Programme in Insurance and Risk management

College_Summary: Bilaspur University also known as Atal Bihari Vajpayee Vishwavidyalaya (ABVV) is a state university with a jurisdiction extended over 4 districts of Chattisgarh. The university alongwith its 87 affiliated colleges offers undergraduate and postgraduate programmes in different specializations of Arts, Science, Commerce, Law, centres of research & Education under the guidance of qualified and experienced faculty members.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Science [B.Sc] + Master of Science [M.Sc]
Bachelor of Commerce [B.Com] + Master of Commerce [M.Com] (Commerce & Financial Studies)

College_Name: College of Dairy and Food Science Technology - [CDFST], Raipur
College_Summary: Dau Shri Vasudev Chandrakar Kamdhenu Vishwavidyala was established in 1983. The College provides an undergraduate and postgraduate program in Dairy Science and Food Technology in the field of dairy. The admission is based on the merit list of state-level competitive examination “All India Common Pre Veterinary Test” conducted by Chhattisgarh State Professional Examination Board. The application mode is online.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Technology [B.Tech] (Dairy Science and Food Technology)

College_Summary: MATS School of Law is located in Raipur, Chhattisgarh and was established in 2006. The institute is NAAC B++ accredited and approved by BCI, NCTE, AICTE, and UGC.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Business Administration + Bachelor of Laws [BBALLB]
Bachelor of Arts + Bachelor of Laws [B.A.L.L.B.]

College_Summary: Pt. Jawaharlal Nehru Memorial Medical College is a renowned government medical college established in 1963 in Raipur, Chattisgarh. The college is affiliated with Pt. Deendayal Upadhyay Memorial Health Sciences and Ayush University of Chhattisgarh, Raipur. The college is recognized by the Medical Council of India (MCI). Pt. JNM Medical College Raipur offers undergraduate, postgraduate, diploma and MCh programmes.

College_Name: Late Baliram Kashyap Memorial Govt. Medical College, Jagdalpur
Late Shri Lakhi Ram Agrawal Memorial Government Medical College
College_Summary: Late Shri LakhiRam Agrawal Memorial Government Medical College is known for its unwavering dedication to technological advancements, medical research, and comprehensive healthcare services. Beyond academic excellence, the college has state-of-the-art facilities and resources like a hostel, library, canteen, sports ground and auditorium fostering an environment that encourages innovative educational methodologies and technological integration. Late Shri LakhiRam Agrawal Memorial Government Medical College hosts a series of diverse computing events, including cultural fеstivals, sports mееts, sеminars, workshops, and awarеnеss campaigns

Government Medical College, Rajnandgaon established in the year 2014 has created quite a name for itself within this short span of time and is considered one of the best medical colleges in Chhattisgarh. It is affiliated to Pt. Deen Dayal Upadhyay Memorial Ayush and Health Science University and has been approved by MCI. The college offers an MBBS program with an intake capacity of 125 students per year. Admissions are done strictly on the basis of marks obtained in the NEET-UG.

College_Summary: Shri Rawatpura Sarkar Institute of Pharmacy - [SRSIP], Durg, Chhattisgarh was established in the year 2004 and is affiliated to Chhattisgarh Swami Vivekanand Technical University and is recognized by UGC and AICTE.

Sai College, Bhilai is a Private college of higher education established in 2005. The college is affiliated with Pt. Ravishankar Shukla University has been accredited by NAAC. It offers BBA, BCA, B.Sc. at the UG level, M.Sc. (Biotechnology), PGDCA at the PG level, and also a DCA program. Admissions to the courses are purely merit-based. The college provides the students with quality education under highly-qualified faculties and excellent exposure to the corporate world.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Post Graduate Diploma in Computer Applications [PGDCA]

College_Summary: St. Thomas College located at Bhilai, Chattisgarh was established in 1984. The college is affiliated to Pt. Ravishankar Shukla University, Raipur. NAAC has re-accredited this college at the B++ level. It offers undergraduate, postgraduate, Research programs to its students under various specializations. Admission to these courses is based on merit and the students have to apply offline for admission. The college gives equal importance to cultural, literary, and sports activities ensuring to provide a bright career to its students.

College_Name: New Horizon Dental College & Research Institute, Bilaspur
Shri Narayan Prasad Awasthi Government Ayurved College, Raipur

College_Summary: Govt. TCL College was established in 1958 under Saraswati Teaching Committee and initially only consisted of art classes. The college was renamed as Janjgir, Government TCL Postgraduate College in memory of Barrister Thakur Chedilal Dhak Freedom Struggle Fighter, when he was under government in 1975. In the year 1983 Govt. TCL College came into existence as a law college.

College_Summary: Hemchand Yadav Vishwavidyalaya or Hemchand Yadav University, formerly Durg Vishwavidyalaya or Durg University, is a State-affiliated University situated in the district of Durg in the state of Chattisgarh. Established in the year 2015, Durg University has 138 affiliated colleges across five districts: Durg, Bemetara, Balod, Rajnandgaon, and Kabirdham. Among these, 62 are government colleges, and 76 are private colleges. The university's urban campus is well-equipped with facilities like a library, canteen, practical labs, and a sports complex.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Science [B.Sc] + Bachelor of Education [B.Ed]

College_Name: Rungta College of Pharmaceutical Sciences and Research - [RCPSR], Bhilai
College_Summary: Rungta College of Pharmaceutical Sciences and Research, Bhilai is approved by DTE and Pharmacy Council of India (PCI). The institute is affiliated with CSVTU, Bhilai. RCPSR offers a UG, PG and Diploma program in the discipline of Pharmacy. Admission in the courses is both merit and entrance-based. The institute also provided B.Pharm in the lateral entry which is of 3 years. The institute also provides 100% placement assistance to its students. It is the only group in Chhattisgarh that provides jobs to other college students through its Free Mega Job Fair - PLACEMENTNAAMA, with almost 40 companies participating. More than 2,500 offer letters were grabbed in the Current Session through Campus Drives and PLACEMENTNAAMA by students. The highest package is recorded at INR 48 LPA. Additionally, the institute has another campus in Raipur offering degree and diploma courses in the above-mentioned discipline. Check: RCPSR Raipur

College_Name: Design Solution Institute of Fashion Designing  - [DSIFD], Raipur
College_Summary: Design Solution Institute of Fashion Designing (DSIFD), Raipur is a training institute established in 2018 to educate students in fashion, interior design and event management. The institue has affiliation with Shri Krishna University, Indore and ISBM University Raipur. The institute offers a variety of courses in Fashion Designing, Interior Designing, and Event Management. It has a world-class infrastructure and highly trained & professional faculties. The institute provides 100% placements and focuses on skill development.

College_Name: Shri Shankaracharya Institute Of Medical Sciences - [SSIMS], Bhilai
College_Summary: Established in the year 2013, Shri Shankaracharya Institute Of Medical Sciences, Bhilai, Chhattisgarh is a private institution managed by Shri Gangajali Shri Shankaracharya Education Society. SSIMS offers a wide range of courses from UG/ PG up to Paramedical certificate courses. Some of which are MBBS and MD. Admission to these courses is based on both entrance and merit. The application mode is both online and offline.

College_Name: Rungta College of Pharmaceutical Science & Research [RCPSR], Raipur
College_Summary: Rungta College of Pharmaceutical Sciences & Research (RCPSR), Raipur is a private institute. The college offers B. Pharm at the UG level, and a Diploma in D. Pharm. the admission in the courses is both merit and entrance-based. The candidate should have a valid CGPPHT score. The Institute also provided B. Pharm in lateral entry for three years. Check: RCPSR Raipur Courses and Fees

College_Name: GDCST, Bhilai- GD Rungta College of Science & Technology
College_Summary: GD Rungta College of Science & Technology (GDRCST), Bhilai was established under the aegis of REF Bhilai. GDRCST offers UG, PG and Diploma courses in Science, Humanities, Technology, and Management. The flagship courses of the institute include BBA, B.Sc across 5 specializations, M.Sc in Biotechnology and an MBA course. Other popular courses include BCA, MSW, B.Ed, D.Ed and a PGDCA program. GDRCST also runs a Ph.D across 10 specializations, a BA and a B.Com course. Admission to most of the programs is done on the basis of marks secured in entrance tests. However, candidates seeking admission to the B.Ed and D.Ed course must obtain valid scores in Pre-B.Ed and Pre D.Ed tests.

College_Name: RIPER Bhilai- Rungta Institute of Pharmaceutical Education & Research
College_Summary: Rungta Institute of Pharmaceutical Education & Research (RIPER) is approved by DTE and Pharmacy Council of India (PCI). The Institute is affiliated with Chhattisgarh Swami Vivekanand Technical University, Bhilai. RIPER offers B. Pharm and D. Pharm programs by this Institute and the admission in the courses is both merit and entrance based. For B.Pharm admission, candidates must qualify in the CGPPHT test. The Institute also runs B. Pharm in lateral entry which is a 3 years program instead of 4 years.

College_Name: KDRCST, Raipur- KD Rungta College of Science And Technology
College_Summary: KD Rungta College of Science And Technology, Raipur was established in 2010. The institute comes under the aegis of RGI, Raipur. The institute offers undergraduate and postgraduate diploma courses in the discipline of Management, Science, Computer Applications, Education, etc. The most popular courses of the instution include BBA, BCA, B.Ed and B.Sc in Biotechnology. Apart from that, KDRCST offers B.Com in Computer Application and a PGDCA course. Admission tomost courses at KDRCST Raipur is done on the basis of merit.  However, B.Ed admission is based on Pre-B.Ed entrance test.

College_Name: Rungta Institute of Pharmaceutical Sciences - [RIPS], Bhilai
College_Summary: Rungta Institute of Pharmaceutical Sciences (RIPS), Bhilai comes under the aegis of  Sanjay Rungta Group of Institutions Bhilai. The college offers undergraduate and diploma courses in the discipline Pharmacy.

Government Polytechnic Durg was started with Civil, Mechanical, and Electrical Engineering diploma courses on 1962. The Metallurgy, Electronics and Tele-communication, and Computer Science and Information Technology courses got added in the years of 1964, 1981, and 2000 respectively. Provision for taking up Part-Time Diploma Courses were initiated in the year of 1984.

Mansha Polytechnic at Bhilai is a technical institute offering diploma, which is located in Bhilai, the steel city of Chhattisgarh State. The college offers diploma degree in three major branches of Engineering namely: Mechanical, Civil, and Electrical Engineering. It admits students on the basis of marks obtained in 10th boards/ 10+2 level examination or equivalent. The placement record of the college is increasing over the years.

Bharti College of Polytechnic at Durg is one among the Bharti Group of Colleges, which is functioning under Shri Jug Mahadev Education Society (SJMES). The main aim of the institute is to achieve Academic Excellence in Technical Education by incorporating the Principles of Total Quality Management (TQM). Bharti College of Polytechnic offers diploma courses in various branches of Engineering. The admissions are made only according to the rankings secured by the candidates in Chhattisgarh Pre-Polytechnic Test (CG PPT).

Shri Rawatpura Sarkar Polytechnic, Raipur, in Chhattisgarh, is a private college offering diploma courses in Civil, Electrical, and Mechanical Engineering. Admissions will be allotted on the basis of ranking secured by the students in the CG PPT (Chhattisgarh Pre-PolyTechnic Test). The college is equipped with all the necessary facilities for the students and is spread across a campus area of 25 acres. The placements will be supported by few of the faculties.

Shri Sai Polytechnic College was founded in the year 2013 and is affiliated to Chhattisgarh Swami Vivekanand Technical University. The College is approved by AICTE and recognized by DTE and C.G. Government. It offers a Diploma programme in numerous specializations and admission in the course is on the basis of PPT entrance test. Candidates can apply to this College online.

College_Name: Chhatrapati Shivaji Institute of Pharmacy - [CSIP], Durg
College_Summary: Chhatrapati Shivaji Institute of Pharmacy (CSIP), Durg started its journey in the year 2019 with the goal to provide professional infrastructure in technical education to the state of Chhattisgarh. The institute comes under the aegis of Chhatrapati Shivaji Group of Institutions (CSGI). CIPS offers an undergraduate and a diploma course in Pharmacy. The institute has two sister institutes which are as follows:

College_Summary: Raipur Institute of Medical Sciences (RIMS) is one of the popular medical colleges located in Raipur, Chattisgarh. RIMS Raipur was established in the year 2012 and has been doing well since its inception leading it to become one of the top medical colleges in the region. RIMS Raipur is affiliated with Ayush and Health Sciences University of Chhattisgarh and is approved by the National Medical Commission (NMC). The institute offers various UG and PG courses in the field of medicine and nursing. RIMS Raipur also offers certificate courses in paramedical sciences.

Modern College of Management and Information Technology (MCMIT) is a private institute established by Bilquis Education Society in 2006 in Korba, Chattisgarh. MCMIT is affiliated with Atal Bihari Vajpayee Vishwavidyalaya, Bilaspur. The institute offers UG, PG, Diploma and PG Diploma programs. Additionally, it also offers an “O” level computer course. Admission at MCMIT is purely based on merit. MCMIT provides placement in top companies like TCS, Wipro, Kotak Mahindra, CISCO, ICICI, Infosys, HCL, etc.

College_Name: Sanjay Rungta Group of Institutions- (SRGI), Bhilai
College_Summary: Sanjay Rungta Group of Institutions, Bhilai is a private institute which offers various UG and PG courses in diverse disciplines. The flagship courses are B.Tech and BDS in which thousands of students get enrolled every year. Admission to the B.Tech course will be done based on the candidate's performance in PET/JEE Main Score whereas for BDS Admissions students must hold a valid NEET Score The training and placement cell at SRGI acts as an interface between the industry and the students and facilitates the campus recruitment drives of the reputed companies.

Chanakya Community College, Raipur offers B.Sc at the UG level, M.Sc at the PG level and Diploma, Advanced Diploma and certification courses in the discipline of Interior Design, Fashion Design and Fine arts. Admission to B.Sc, Diploma and advanced diploma is based on candidates previous years qualifying examination followed by a Personal Interview Round

Space Institute of Design and Innovation - [SIDI], Raipur

College_Summary: Chouksey Group of Colleges is a private educational institute established in 2001 in Bilaspur, Chhattisgarh. The institute is approved by AICTE and PCI. It is affiliated with CSVTU Bhilai. Chouksey Group of Colleges offer higher education through its different institutes in the fields of Pharmacy, Engineering, Homeopathy, Science and Commerce. Some of the popular courses offered by the Chouksey Group of Colleges are BE, M.Tech., MBA, B.Com, B.Sc., BHMS and PGDCA. The institute has collaborated with organizations like, NASSCOM, the Indian Society for Technical Education, IIT Kharagpur, AWS Academy, DELNET, etc. Admission is based on the counselling process conducted by DTE Chhattisgarh. More than 2000 students are enrolled in the Chouksey Group of Colleges.
